name: confidential-cat-counter
description: Privacy-preserving machine learning reference architecture demonstrating client-side encryption with server-side ML processing

scripts.lint: cd src/web-client && npm run lint && cd ../ml-service && black --check . && flake8 .
scripts.format: cd src/web-client && npm run format && cd ../ml-service && black .
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:tag
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:tag
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:tag
scripts.version:tag: git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git tag v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')
scripts.prerelease: npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.release: npm run prerelease && npm run version:minor
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && npm run version:patch
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && npm run version:major

author: Confidential Cat Counter Team
